SEC Current Events

Source: R/current_events.R
current_events.Rd

Provides access to the SEC Current Events search tool from here

current_events(day, form)

Arguments

day

(0-5) Day to search for current forms. e.g. '2' returns forms from 2 business days ago.
form

Form to return filings (e.g. '10-K')

Value

A dataframe with one row per company with Includes the following columns -

  • cik

  • type

  • href

  • company_name

  • company_href

  • filing_date

Examples

# \donttest{
current_events(0, "10-K")[1:5,]
#>     type
#> 1 10-K/A
#> 2 10-K/A
#> 3   10-K
#> 4 10-K/A
#> 5   10-K
#>                                                                              href
#> 1 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1427925/0001437749-20-007965-index.html
#> 2 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1746037/0001193125-20-110791-index.html
#> 3 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1534155/0001534155-20-000125-index.html
#> 4  https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/707388/0000707388-20-000013-index.html
#> 5 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1379043/0000717588-20-000049-index.html
#>       cik
#> 1 1427925
#> 2 1746037
#> 3 1534155
#> 4  707388
#> 5 1379043
#>                                                             company_href
#> 1 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1427925
#> 2 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1746037
#> 3 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1534155
#> 4  https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=707388
#> 5 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1379043
#>                              company_name filing_date
#> 1              ACELRX PHARMACEUTICALS INC  2020-04-17
#> 2         ARYA SCIENCES ACQUISITION CORP.  2020-04-17
#> 3 Ameri Metro, Inc. (formerly Yellowwood)  2020-04-17
#> 4                            DIGIRAD CORP  2020-04-17
#> 5           DUKE MOUNTAIN RESOURCES, INC.  2020-04-17
# }
